cards.name: Life 0
cards.topEffect: End: If this card is covered, delete this card.
cards.middleEffect: Play the top card of your deck face down in each line where you have a card.

cards.name: Life 1
cards.middleEffect: Flip a card. Flip a card.

cards.name: Life 2
cards.middleEffect: Draw 1 card. You MAY flip 1 face down card.

cards.name: Life 3
cards.bottomEffect: When this card would be covered: first, play the top card of your deck face-down in another line.

cards.name: Life 4
cards.middleEffect: If this card is covering a card, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Light 0
cards.middleEffect: Flip 1 card. Draw cards equal to that card's value (2 if face down).

cards.name: Light 2
cards.middleEffect: Draw 2 cards. Reveal 1 face down card. You may shift OR flip that card.

cards.name: Light 3
cards.middleEffect: Shift all face down cards in this line to another line.

cards.name: Light 4
cards.middleEffect: Your opponent reveals their hand.

cards.name: Psychic 0
cards.middleEffect: Draw 2 cards. Your opponent discards 2 cards, then reveals their hand.

cards.name: Psychic 1
cards.topEffect: Your opponent can only play cards face-down.

cards.name: Psychic 2
cards.middleEffect: Your opponent discards 2 cards. Rearrange their protocols.

cards.name: Psychic 3
cards.middleEffect: Your opponent discards 1 card. Shift 1 of their cards.

cards.name: Psychic 4
cards.bottomEffect: End: You may return 1 of your opponent's cards. If you do, flip this card.

cards.name: Speed 0
cards.middleEffect: Play 1 card.

cards.name: Speed 1
cards.topEffect: After you clear cache: Draw 1 card.
cards.middleEffect: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Speed 2
cards.topEffect: When this card would be deleted by compiling: Shift this card instead, even if covered.

cards.name: Speed 3
cards.middleEffect: Shift 1 of your other cards.
cards.bottomEffect: End: You may shift one of your cards. If you do, flip this card.

cards.name: Speed 4
cards.middleEffect: Shift one of your opponent's face down cards.

cards.name: Gravity 0
cards.middleEffect: For every 2 cards in this line, play the top card of your deck face down under this card.

cards.name: Gravity 1
cards.middleEffect: Draw 2 cards. Shift 1 card either to or from this line.

cards.name: Gravity 2
cards.middleEffect: Flip 1 card. Shift that card to this line.

cards.name: Gravity 4
cards.middleEffect: Shift 1 face down card to this line.

cards.name: Gravity 6
cards.middleEffect: Your opponent plays the top card of their deck face down in this line.

cards.name: Water 0
cards.middleEffect: Flip 1 other card. Flip this card.

cards.name: Water 1
cards.middleEffect: Play the top card of your deck face-down in each other line.

cards.name: Water 2
cards.middleEffect: Draw 2 cards. Rearrange your protocols.

cards.name: Water 3
cards.middleEffect: Return all cards with a value of 2 in one line.

cards.name: Darkness 0
cards.middleEffect: Draw 3 cards. Shift one of your opponent's covered cards.

cards.name: Darkness 1
cards.middleEffect: Flip 1 of your opponent's cards. You MAY shift that card.

cards.name: Darkness 2
cards.topEffect: All face down cards in this stack have a value of 4.
cards.middleEffect: You may flip 1 covered card in this line.

cards.name: Darkness 3
cards.middleEffect: Play 1 card face down in another line.

cards.name: Darkness 4
cards.middleEffect: Shift 1 face down card.

cards.name: Love 1
cards.middleEffect: Draw the top card of your opponent's deck.
cards.bottomEffect: End: You may give 1 card from your hand to your opponent. If you do, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Love 2
cards.middleEffect: Your opponent draws 1 card. Refresh.

cards.name: Love 3
cards.middleEffect: Take 1 random card from your opponent's hand. Give 1 card from your hand to your opponent.

cards.name: Love 4
cards.middleEffect: Reveal 1 card from your hand. Flip 1 card.

cards.name: Love 6
cards.middleEffect: Your opponent draws 2 cards.

cards.name: Hate 1
cards.middleEffect: Discard 3 cards. Delete 1 card. Delete 1 card.

cards.name: Hate 2
cards.middleEffect: Delete your highest value uncovered card. Delete your opponent's highest value uncovered card.

cards.name: Hate 3
cards.topEffect: After you delete cards: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Hate 4
cards.bottomEffect: When this card would be covered: First delete the lowest value covered card in this line.

cards.name: Death 0
cards.middleEffect: Delete 1 card from each other line.

cards.name: Death 1
cards.topEffect: Start: You may draw 1 card. If you do, delete 1 other card, then delete this card.

cards.name: Death 2
cards.middleEffect: Delete all cards in 1 line with values of 1 or 2.

cards.name: Death 3
cards.middleEffect: Delete 1 face down card.

cards.name: Death 4
cards.bottomEffect: Delete a card with a value of 0 or 1.

cards.name: Apathy 0
cards.topEffect: Your total value in this line is increased by 1 for each face down card in this line.

cards.name: Apathy 1
cards.middleEffect: Flip all other face up cards in this line.

cards.name: Apathy 2
cards.topEffect: Ignore all middle commands on cards in this line.
cards.bottomEffect: When this card would be covered: First flip this card.

cards.name: Apathy 3
cards.middleEffect: Flip one of your opponent's face up cards.

cards.name: Apathy 4
cards.bottomEffect: You may flip 1 of your face up covered cards.

cards.name: Metal 0
cards.topEffect: Your opponent's total value in this line is reduced by 2.
cards.middleEffect: Flip 1 card.

cards.name: Metal 1
cards.middleEffect: Draw 2 cards. Your opponent cannot compile next turn.

cards.name: Metal 2
cards.topEffect: Your opponent cannot play cards face down in this line.

cards.name: Metal 3
cards.middleEffect: Draw 1 card. Delete all cards in 1 other line with 8 or more cards.

cards.name: Metal 6
cards.topEffect: When this card would be covered or flipped: First, delete this card.

cards.name: Plague 0
cards.middleEffect: Your opponent discards 1 card.
cards.bottomEffect: Your opponent cannot play cards in this line.

cards.name: Plague 1
cards.topEffect: After your opponent discards cards: Draw 1 card.
cards.middleEffect: Your opponent discards 1 card.

cards.name: Plague 2
cards.middleEffect: Discard 1 or more cards. Your opponent discards the amount discarded plus 1.

cards.name: Plague 3
cards.middleEffect: Flip each other face up card.

cards.name: Plague 4
cards.bottomEffect: End: Your opponent deletes 1 of their face down cards. You may flip this card.

cards.name: Spirit 0
cards.middleEffect: Refresh. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Spirit 1
cards.topEffect: When you play cards face up, they may be played without matching protocols.
cards.middleEffect: Draw 2 cards.
cards.bottomEffect: Start: Either discard 1 card or flip this card.

cards.name: Spirit 2
cards.middleEffect: You may flip 1 card.

cards.name: Spirit 3
cards.topEffect: After you draw cards: You may shift this card, even if this card is covered.

cards.name: Spirit 4
cards.bottomEffect: Swap the positions of 2 of your protocols.

cards.name: Fire 0
cards.middleEffect: Flip 1 other card. Draw 2 cards.
cards.bottomEffect: When this card would be covered: First draw 1 card and flip 1 other card.

cards.name: Fire 1
cards.middleEffect: Discard 1 card. If you do, delete 1 card.

cards.name: Fire 2
cards.middleEffect: Discard 1 card. If you do, return 1 card.

cards.name: Fire 3
cards.bottomEffect: End: You may discard 1 card. If you do, flip 1 card.

cards.name: Fire 4
cards.middleEffect: Discard 1 or more cards. Draw the amount discarded plus 1.
